item.description: Akshay Kumar Helps 25-Year-Old Girl With Her Heart Transplant Surgery, Donates… Akshay, who has been actively helping the needy, has stated that if the need arises, he will donate more money to Ayushi's family.

item.description: When Anurag Kashyap’s Daughter Asked How He’d React If She Got Pregnant Aaliyah has a YouTube channel of her own where she interacts with celebrities and on the occasion of Father’s Day, her guest was none other than her dad Anurag.

item.description: New Ant-Man And The Wasp Quantumania Trailer: Scott Lang Faces Madness of Multiverse, Loki’s Kang The new Ant-Man And The Wasp: Quantumania trailer revealed a lot of new footage, teasing an epic battle between Paul Rudd's Scott Lang and Jonathan Majors' Kang.

item.title: Jacqueline Fernandez Never Intended to Defame Nora Fatehi or Made Any Statement Against Her: Lawyer
item.description: Jacqueline Fernandez Never Intended to Defame Nora Fatehi or Made Any Statement Against Her: Lawyer Nora Fatehi has alleged that Jacqueline Fernandez made 'defamatory imputations' against her in Sukesh Chandrashekar’s money laundering case.

item.description: Vin Diesel Remembers Paul Walker On 9th Death Anniversary With Nostalgic Pic, Fast and Furious Fans Emotional Vin Diesel took to Instagram on his friend Pual Walker's ninth death anniversary and penned an emotional note alongside their throwback photo.

item.description: Kareena Kapoor Khan Can’t Get Over Her ‘Poo’ Dialogues from K3G, and Neither Can We Kareena Kapoor Khan shared a mirror selfie on Saturday with one of the most iconic dialogues of her character Poo from Kabhie Khushi Kabhie Gham.

item.title: Vijay Fined Rs 500 By Chennai Traffic Police For Flouting Tinted Glass Norms
item.description: Vijay Fined Rs 500 By Chennai Traffic Police For Flouting Tinted Glass Norms As per the apex court, a vehicle's windows should be completely transparent.

item.description: Bigg Boss 16: Kushal Tandon Questions Sumbul’s Father’s Call, Slams Him For Speaking Ill About Tina Former Bigg Boss contestant Kushal Tandon has questioned Bigg Boss 16 makers for allowing Sumbul to talk to her father.

item.title: Actor Krishna Passes Away; Delhi Courts Grants Bail To Jacqueline Fernandez In Rs 200 Cr Extortion Case
item.description: Actor Krishna Passes Away; Delhi Courts Grants Bail To Jacqueline Fernandez In Rs 200 Cr Extortion Case Krishna, veteran Telugu actor-producer and Mahesh Babu’s father passed away; Delhi's Patiala House court grants bail to Jacqueline Fernandez in Rs 200 crore extortion case.

item.title: Shah Rukh Khan Receives First Global Icon of Cinema and Cultural Narrative Award In UAE
item.description: Shah Rukh Khan Receives First Global Icon of Cinema and Cultural Narrative Award In UAE King Khan has been felicitated with the award for his contribution to the cultural landscape, and development in the field of writing and creativity.
